description: Forest Department - Order to declare - the Mahamederiya Forest in Tawalama, Tawalama D/S Division, Godahenkanda Forest in Nakiyadeniya, D/S Division, Yakkalamulla and the Watlahena Forest in Nabadawa, D/S Division - Yakkalamulla and Nagoda all of Galle District as Reserved Forests and Habarakada Forest in Habarakada D/S Division - Tawalama, Galle District as Conservation Forest from 07.05.2014
